doc.name: TransformationRule
doc.description: A transformation rule that contains a pattern and a replacement. It has two purposes. As an abstraction of a transformation rule, it groups the pattern and the replacement and relate objects between them (with ptolemy.actor.gt.PatternObjectAttribute associated to objects in the replacement). As an actor, it has a port that accepts model tokens containing models to be transformed, and it produces transformed models in new model tokens to another port.
doc.author: Thomas Huining Feng
doc.property: The count of repeated transformation in one firing.
Whether the transformation in one firing should continue until a fixpoint is reached.
